title: Polki Diamond Chandbali Pendant Haaram - A Regal Fusion
features: This exquisite pendant haaram showcases the timeless elegance of Polki diamonds arranged in a floral motif, reminiscent of Mughal-inspired jewelry designs. The intricate open setting of the Polkis allows maximum light reflection, enhancing their natural brilliance. Below the pendant, a delicate cascade of ruby beads and seed pearls adds a touch of traditional South Indian charm. The tassel-like arrangement, a modern interpretation of the traditional chandbali design, makes this piece uniquely versatile. The chain itself is adorned with spaced Polki diamonds set in individual bezels.

description: This haaram is a perfect blend of tradition and modernity. The use of authentic Polki diamonds gives it an antique charm, while the contemporary pendant design offers a fresh perspective. The Hyderabadi polish adds a lustrous finish. The combination of Polki, rubies, and pearls symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it a meaningful heirloom piece. Its versatile design allows it to be paired with both traditional and modern attire.
